channel.title: Comments on: Single Line PHP Script to Gain Shell
channel.description: A place for my thoughts when I was starting to break into the information security feild

item.title: By: Graeme Robinson
item.dc:creator: Graeme Robinson
item.description:
In reply to <a href="/single-line-php-script-to-gain-shell/#comment-5061347">Daniel</a>.
Thanks, my brother made them for a custom mouse mat that he had made for our parents years ago
item.content:encoded:
In reply to Daniel.

Thanks, my brother made them for a custom mouse mat that he had made for our parents years ago

item.title: By: Reverse shells even without nc on Linux | Graeme Robinson's blog

item.description: […] when I get remote command execution on a linux system for example I’ve planted my one line php script , the next step is getting a remote shell. Usually an nc listener would be used to receive the […]
